ui.m_change_product: Do you want to change material?

carbon.name: Coal
carbon.description: Dark basic mineral. Perfect for beginners.

cobre.name: Copper
cobre.description: Malleable reddish metal. Easy to work with.

hierro.name: Iron
hierro.description: Durable gray metal. Excellent for tools.

plata.name: Silver
plata.description: Precious shiny metal. Highly valuable on market.

tungsteno.name: Tungsten
tungsteno.description: Resistant high-hardness metal. Rare and valuable.

oro.name: Gold
oro.description: Precious yellow metal. Extremely rare and expensive.

obsidiana.name: Obsidian
obsidiana.description: Black volcanic glass. Very sharp when broken.

cobalto.name: Cobalt
cobalto.description: Exotic blue metal. Toxic but powerful.

mithril.name: Mithril
mithril.description: Mythical shiny metal. Legendary and nearly impossible to find.

oricalco.name: Orichalcum
oricalco.description: Divine golden alloy. Symbol of supreme power.

titanio.name: Titanium
titanio.description: Extremely resistant metal. Forged by titans.

draconita.name: Dragonite
draconita.description: Mineral extracted from dragons. Latent draconic power.

madera-blanda.name: Soft Wood
madera-blanda.description: Light wood easy to cut. Perfect for beginners.

roble.name: Oak Wood
roble.description: Robust and durable wood. Ideal for structures.

nogal.name: Walnut Wood
nogal.description: Dense dark wood. Excellent for fine finishes.

caoba.name: Mahogany Wood
caoba.description: Precious reddish wood. Highly appreciated by craftsmen.

ebano.name: Ebony Wood
ebano.description: Rare black wood. Symbol of elegance and power.

petreo.name: Petrified Wood
petreo.description: Fossilized wood almost turned to stone. Extremely hard.

ancestral.name: Ancestral Wood
ancestral.description: Ancient wood from past ages. Imbued with history.

magica.name: Magical Wood
magica.description: Enchanted wood with arcane power. Channels magic.

sagrada.name: Sacred Wood
sagrada.description: Blessed wood from temples. Radiates peace and protection.

primordial.name: Primordial Wood
primordial.description: Wood from the first times. Essence of the ancient forest.

dimensional.name: Dimensional Wood
dimensional.description: Wood from other dimensions. Defies the laws of physics.

divina.name: Divine Wood
divina.description: Wood of the gods. Supreme celestial material.
